metadata.title: CVE-2020-28282 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Prototype pollution vulnerability in 'getobject' version 0.1.0 allows anattacker to cause a denial of service and may lead to remote codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28282` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-getobject - 1.0.2-2
node-getobject - 1.0.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-getobject package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.2-2').
